name: CategorizeVendorPaymentRefund
description:
Categorize bank transactions as Vendor Payment Refund.

Use this tool to categorize uncategorized bank transactions as vendor payment refunds. It should be called when organizing financial data related to refunds from vendors.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the organization whose transactions are being categorized.

parameters.name: bank_statement_line_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the bank statement line to categorize as Vendor Payment Refund.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the bank statement line.

parameters.name: vendor_payment_refund_details
parameters.description: Details for categorizing a bank transaction as a vendor payment refund. Includes vendor payment ID, transaction date, refund mode, reference number, amount, exchange rate, to-account ID, and description.

vendorpayment_id.description: Vendor Payment to which you want to record the refund.

refund_mode.description: Mode of refund. Ex - Cash, Cheque etc.,

exchange_rate.description: The foreign currency exchange rate value.

to_account_id.description: ID of the account to which the money gets transferred(Mandatory for specific type of transactions). Ex: From a bank account, to-account can be: bank, card, drawings, expense,credit notes. From a card account, to-account can be: card, bank, expense.

description.description: A brief description about the transaction.
